customer_reviews.title: This is THE helmet to buy for you, your kids or grand-kids.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable yet secure fit for my big noggin. Easy to adjust. *Meets bicylce (CPSC), BMX (ASTM F-2032) and skating (ASTM F1492) safety standards. Looking forward to riding with it. Will update if any problems...but none out of the box. *Does NOT meet downhill MB standard, you need a face-plate for that. I DID NOT RECEIVE A DISCOUNT FROM ANYONE FOR THIS REVIEW; HOWEVER, BELL IF YOU'RE OUT THERE AND YOU WANT TO GIVE ME SOME MONEY I'M DOWN WITH THAT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Devil

customer_reviews.title: Medium is too small for Adult skull!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED REVIEW: I give it FIVE stars now! Size Medium was TOO SMALL!! I measured my noggin at 22 inches at the largest part. The sizing chart called for a medium but I'm returning it for a large. Update: large is in, fits perfect with larger inserts - Kryptonite color can be seen from SPACE, looks great with the matching Specialized bike (sold separately). NOTE: the Matte Grey/Green is a Matte grey HELMET with a Green chinstrap. Video review attached of what it looks like in REAL LIFE in direct sunlight - feels like it would protect from a decent spill, many of which I intend on having ... but off road only!
customer_reviews.author: Armand5000

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend this
customer_reviews.text: I bought Bell Segment helmets for my whole family. Being the more accident-prone of us I was the first to demonstrate its quality when I was hit by a car. It was too fast for me to register what happened but the witnesses stated I was flipped over the car and landed head first on the back of my head before rolling to a stop. I do remember the impact of my head on the ground and thinking to myself "Well, this is going to be bad". My helmet is ruined (the inner foam liner is very broken) but I am not. I definitely recommend this helmet
customer_reviews.author: j_Geek

customer_reviews.title: Head Conforming Style
customer_reviews.text: This helmet was a perfect fit right out of the box. What I like most about this helmet is how it conforms closely to the shape of my head, rather than sticking out. Also, many other helmets have big size adjustment knobs at the back of the head, which seem to me to be a hazard in a fall where I might hit the back of my head. I bought this helmet for ice skating, a sport where most adults do not wear helmets, greatly underestimating the danger of serious brain injury from an unexpected fall. Being dull black, I love the looks, and that it stands out less than other colors. Also excellent for cycling in cooler weather.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Gregorios

customer_reviews.title: Not wat I expected
customer_reviews.text: I'm used to the hard-shell type of Bell helmets. This new style has a flexable outer shell that I don't like. The inside liner ,that was across my far head ,had a rough bottom edge that was annoying. If I tried to move it , it looked like the Velcro buttons , that were glued to the inside of the shell , might rip off . So I left it alone. I'm not saying that the hehmet won't work, I just don't like it for those reasons . I will go back into a bicycle store that sells Bell , find the type that I like , and try again on Amazon for that model.

product_meta.title: Bell Segment Multi-Sport Helmet
product_meta.description: Flexible Flight - There's no question that the simple skate-style helmet is a much-loved classic shape. People love the way they look…but they don't always love the way they feel. The new Segment is gonna change all that. Despite what looks like a rigid bowl-style shell, the Segment is actually flexible. Utilizing a series of interior EPS foam segments connected by a reinforcing skeleton, the helmet conforms to your head, fitting much more like a cap than a helmet, all while still meeting safety standards - including the ASTM F2031 BMX enhancement. Simply amazing.
